plugin.lastUpdateInfo:
v0.3.1: new 'MOC: update plugin settings' command, and minor tweaks.

plugin.commands.name: make MOC
arguments: filename of MOC to write to
comma-settings list of search term(s) to use

plugin.settings.title: Match whole words?
plugin.settings.description: Should search terms only match whole words? For non-European languages, this may need to be set to false.

plugin.settings.title: Folders to exclude
plugin.settings.description: List of folders to exclude in these commands. May be empty. (Note that @Trash, @Templates and @Archive are always excluded.)

plugin.settings.title: Heading level
plugin.settings.description: Heading level (1-5) to use when writing search term headings in notes

plugin.settings.title: Subheading prefix
plugin.settings.description: Subheading text to go before the search term. (Default is 'Notes matching'.)

plugin.settings.title: Prefix for note links
plugin.settings.description: Optional string to put at the start of each note link. (Default is '- '.)

plugin.settings.title: Sort order for results
plugin.settings.description: Whether results are sorted alphabetically (the default), by created date, or by last updated date

plugin.settings.title: Show empty matches?
plugin.settings.description: If no matches of the search term(s) are found, setting this true will still show a heading for the term(s)

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description: Set how much output will be displayed for this plugin the NotePlan > Help > Plugin Console. DEBUG is the most verbose; NONE is the least (silent)
